pageProduct.name: Avene Cleanance Acne Fighting Kit
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Oily Acne prone skin kit containing:
Cleanance Comedomed 5ml
• Highly concentrated formula for targeted dual action
• Acne-fighting, anti-blemishes, anti-recurrence
• Significantly reduces blemishes and blackheads from 7 days*
• Significantly refines pores appearance from 7 days* • Regulates hyper-production of sebum for a matte finish
• Light, non-greasy fluid, quickly absorbed, specifically adapted for oily skin
• Paraben free, fragrance free
• Formulated to minimise the risk of allergic reaction, non-comedogenic
 • Very rich in Avène Thermal Spring Water for its soothing, softening and anti-irritating properties Cleanance Cleansing Gel 100ml
• Soap free for gentle cleansing and respect of the skin hydrolipidic film
• Long-lasting regulation of hyperproduction of sebum
• Doesn’t dry out the skin
• Excellent skin and eye tolerance
• Prepares the skin for daily care
• Formulated to minimise the risk of allergic reaction - non-comedogenic
• Soap free, paraben free, biodegradble formula
• Very rich in Avène Thermal Spring Water for its soothing and anti-irritating properties

Common Uses

2 Step Trial Kit Oily Acne prone Skin Kit containing Cleanser and Anti-blemish concentrate Trial Size offering

Ingredients

Cleanance Comedomed 5ml AVÈNE THERMAL SPRING WATER (AVENE AQUA). ISOPROPYL ALCOHOL. PEG-6. GLYCERIN. SILYBUM MARIANUM FRUIT EXTRACT. SILICA. POLYACRYLATE-13. POLYISOBUTENE. POLYSORBATE 20. SORBITAN ISOSTEARATE. WATER (AQUA). Cleanance Cleansing Gel 100ml AVÈNE THERMAL SPRING WATER (AVENE AQUA). WATER (AQUA). SODIUM LAUROYL METHYL ISETHIONATE. ZINC COCETH SULFATE. POLYSORBATE 20. SODIUM COCOAMPHOACETATE. CETEARETH-60 MYRISTYL GLYCOL. PEG-40 HYDROGENATED CASTOR OIL. GREEN 5 (CI 61570). CITRIC ACID. DISODIUM EDTA. FRAGRANCE (PARFUM). GLYCERYL LAURATE. SODIUM BENZOATE. SODIUM HYDROXIDE. SODIUM SULFATE. YELLOW 5 (CI 19140). ZINC GLUCONATE.

Directions

Cleanance Comedomed 5ml Apply to the face morning and evening after using a Cleanance cleanser. Can be used alone or in combination with medicinal acne treatments (should not be used with oral isotretoin). Suitable for adults and adolescents. The products odour is related to its innovative ingredient and will quickly disappear. Good skin tolerance. Avoid contact with eyes. Cleanance Cleansing Gel 100ml Apply morning and/or evening to wet skin, work up lather, rinse thoroughly then pat dry. If needed, finish with a light mist of Avène Thermal Spring Water, gently pat dry and apply a suitable skin care. It can also be used as a shaving gel for men with oily skin.
